description: This file defines a Flutter widget called ChatScreen, which presents a list of conversation items in a chat interface. It imports material design components, a Conversation model, and a custom chat list item widget. The build method constructs a Scaffold with an AppBar and a ListView displaying mock conversation data.

classes.name: ChatScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of chat conversations.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the ChatScreen, including a Scaffold with an AppBar and a ListView of conversations.
